attributes.comment:
The fee increase is rediculous, outrageous and unacceptable. We are talking
about 80% increase for naturalization, that's too much. Imagine, if you are my
boss, will you give me 80% salary increase this year? If you can't do it, how can
you expect others to to it. USCIS can't get money from the government and try to
rip off the hardworking immigrants. You guys are worst than thief, robbers, rip us
off "legally" and never get punished. I don't mind if there's a 10-20 percent
increase, but not 80%. Beside, you guys provide horrible services. The place I
hate to go the most is the immigration office. I am glad that I am already a US
citizen. But feel sorry for those who are not.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Ron
